column4: are you still trying to get things working with those paritions? Just use two small primary partitions and then manually create the rest once you've got your minimal install working
i can boot into ubuntu fine, i just can't parted or install ubuntu on another partition
you can boot into the *live* cd, right? I mean get it installed on your HD then just fdisk + label
i can boot into my *hard disk* ubuntu fine. fdisk is fine. parted is not
